content: व्यवधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To place between, interpose, intervene; प्रेक्ष्य स्थितां सहचरीं व्यवधाय देहं <ls>R. 9. 57</ls>, {@--2@} To hide, conceal, screen; शापव्यवहितस्मृतिः <ls>Ś. 5.</ls> {@--3@} To separate, divide. {@--4@} To obstruct, interrupt. {@--5@} To neglect, omit, pass over; see व्यवहित also.
व्यवधा {@--1@} That which intervenes. {@--2@} A cover, screen, partition. {@--3@} Concealment.
